devdoc.author: Holograph Foundation
devdoc.details: The entire logic and functionality of the smart contract is self-contained.

constructor.details: Constructor is left empty and init is used instead

init(bytes).details: This function is called by the deployer/factory when creating a contract

params.initPayload: abi encoded payload to use for contract initilaization

owner().details: Address of initial creator/owner of the collection.

_currentTokenId.details: Internal reference used for minting incremental token ids.

_tokenURIs.details: Mapping of IPFS URIs for tokenIds.

_tokenUriType.details: Enum mapping of type of token URI to use for specific tokenId.

_uriType.details: Enum of type of token URI to use globally for the entire contract.

devdoc.title: CXIP ERC-721 Collection that is bridgeable via Holograph

init(bytes).notice: Used internally to initialize the contract instead of through a constructor

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Get's the URI of the token.

userdoc.notice: A smart contract for minting and managing Holograph Bridgeable ERC721 NFTs.
